text: María de los Ángeles "Angelines" Fernández Abad (9 July 1922 - 25 March 1994) was a Spanish-born Mexican actress. She was best remembered for playing Doña Clotilde "La Bruja del 71" in the Televisa sitcom El Chavo del Ocho. She was born in Madrid, Spain. Fernández died from throat cancer in Mexico City, Mexico, aged 71. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Actors from Madrid Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors
title: Angelines Fernández
